title: How AI Agents Create Compounding Advantage for Small Businesses
excerpt: A practical blueprint for using multi-agent workflows in lean teams.
content:
Most small businesses underuse AI by limiting it to chat prompts. A better model is role-based agents: researcher, writer, analyst and reviewer.

When linked into a repeatable workflow, these agents produce compounding operational leverage.

title: 7 Economic Indicators Every Founder Should Track Weekly
excerpt: Turn macro signals into better product, pricing and hiring decisions.
content:
Track inflation, policy rate, forex, sector PMI, credit growth, unemployment and sentiment indexes.

Weekly interpretation beats monthly panic and creates better strategic timing.

title: Agentic EdTech Playbook: Personalization at Scale
excerpt: How to design AI-native learning journeys with measurable outcomes.
content:
Build with diagnostics first, then adaptive modules, then reflective assessment loops.

Your moat is not content alone, but the feedback intelligence layer.
